p: Ethylene emission as affected by the application of the natural products is illustrated in Figure 2C. The application of EO resulted to lower ethylene production compared to the control and EO+Chitosan treatments on the second day of storage. On the fourth day, increased ethylene emission was reported with the combination of EO+AA as to the control treatment, EO and Chitosan+AA, while on the sixth day, the application of EO+Chitosan resulted to higher ethylene production compared to all treatments.
